Package Calendar

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnualSingleCalendar
    create CalenarPanel of one month for Each year this class will be run 12 times.
    CalendarOverview
    this class creates a CALENDAR where user can choose the year the design: every year is not created beforehand due to the large memory.
    CalendarOverview_calendar
    this class sets the layout of the annual calendar and calls its associated class to make monthly calendars and add them to this class that extends JPanel
    ComboBox
    this class creates the panel (ComboBox) that will be added to the Calendar Frame.
    MonthlyCalendar_calendar
    this is the calendarPart, each day will store conversation history, which is text file, and when user clicks the day label, the file list will appear.
    MonthlyCalendarMaker
    this class makes the monthly calendar
